title: The Raven
description: Greyson has had enough surprises to last a lifetime, and that's before Gabriel comes to town. In a town this small, a newcomer is bound to draw attention. What is it about Gabriel that calls to Greyson? What secret is he hiding -- and, worse -- what lies has he already told? What exactly is Greyson willing to risk to protect him?
author: K.R. Stinson
